short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a word count on some things right quick

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Small popup in the upper right corner that will let you define a range for a word count on short essays. The icon is a horse because horses count. The horse has a sombrero because it'll count your essay, ese!
